# Fun Games Hub (MIT License)

This directory contains files sourced from the **fun-games-hub** repository:
https://github.com/nxr-dine/fun-games-hub

Original games used:
- Coin Flip Challenge (`coin-flip/`)
- Memory Match (`memory-game/`)
- Rock Paper Scissors (`rock-paper-scissors/`)

The original project is licensed under the MIT License. See `LICENSE` in this
directory for the full text.

Modifications:
- Updated the page titles to match Kasino Arcade.
- Updated the "Back to Homepage" link to point to `/minigames.php`.
